mapper.insert: insert into EVENTS (EVENT_CATALOG, EVENT_SCHEMA, EVENT_NAME, DEFINER, TIME_ZONE, EVENT_BODY, EVENT_TYPE, EXECUTE_AT, INTERVAL_VALUE, INTERVAL_FIELD, SQL_MODE, STARTS, ENDS, STATUS, ON_COMPLETION, CREATED, LAST_ALTERED, LAST_EXECUTED, EVENT_COMMENT, ORIGINATOR, CHARACTER_SET_CLIENT, COLLATION_CONNECTION, DATABASE_COLLATION, EVENT_DEFINITION) values (#{eventCatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{definer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executeAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{intervalValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intervalField,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sqlMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{starts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ends,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{onCompletion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastAltered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastExecuted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{characterSetClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collationConnection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{databaseCollation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update EVENTS
EVENT_CATALOG = #{row.eventCatalog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_SCHEMA = #{row.eventSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_NAME = #{row.eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEFINER = #{row.definer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_ZONE = #{row.timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_BODY = #{row.eventBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_TYPE = #{row.eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTE_AT = #{row.executeAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INTERVAL_VALUE = #{row.intervalValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERVAL_FIELD = #{row.intervalField,jdbcType=CHAR},
SQL_MODE = #{row.sqlMode,jdbcType=CHAR},
STARTS = #{row.starts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ENDS = #{row.ends,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{row.status,jdbcType=CHAR},
ON_COMPLETION = #{row.onCompletion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{row.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_ALTERED = #{row.lastAltered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTED = #{row.lastExecuted,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVENT_COMMENT = #{row.eventComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINATOR = #{row.originator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHARACTER_SET_CLIENT = #{row.characterSetClient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLATION_CONNECTION = #{row.collationConnection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATABASE_COLLATION = #{row.databaseCollation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_DEFINITION = #{row.eventDefinition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
